options.help:
Global Settings

These settings control site-wide elements that affect your entire website. There's only one global settings record.

Site Info

  • Title: Your website's name, appears in browser tabs and search results
  • Tagline: Short description of your site used in search results
  • Description: Longer site summary for SEO and social sharing
  • Website URL: Your site's public address
  • CMS URL: Address of your admin system

Brand Assets

  • Logo: Main site logo for light backgrounds
  • Dark Mode Logo: Alternate logo for dark themes
  • Favicon: Small icon for browser tabs (max 512×512px)
  • Accent Color: Your brand's primary color for buttons and highlights

Social Media Links

Add URLs for your social profiles:

  • Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn
  • Twitter, YouTube, Vimeo
  • GitHub, Discord, Docker

API Settings

  • OpenAI API Key: Required for AI-powered features
